Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework

Contains set of classes for storing constants and utilities at the framework level.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SCUIErrorMessages
    SCUIErrorMessages lists all the error messages that are used in the exception classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCUIConstants
    SCUIConstants lists all the String constants used in the UIBackend.
    SCUILocalSession
    SCUILocalSession is the session maintained only in one JVM per server.
    SCUITheme
    SCUITheme class represents the theme of the UI frontend.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SCUIAttributeExistsException
    SCUIAttributeExistsException is the runtime exception that is thrown when an attribute with the same key is changed.
    SCUIAuthorizationException
    SCUIAuthorizationException is a SCUIException is thrown when authorization fails on any resource.
    SCUIException
    SCUIException is the general exception that any runtime exception in the UI backend class will extend.
    SCUIMashupException
    SCUIMashupException will be thrown for all mashup related exceptions.
    SCUIValidationException
    SCUIValidationException is thrown when validation fails.

Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework Description

Contains set of classes for storing constants and utilities at the framework level. Also contains set of exceptions thrown by the framework
